fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__MEGAFIST__]: Requires 1 Combo. Choose a player during the day, and choose "forwards" or "backwards". Tonight, they are roleblocked, and are informed they must guess whether you chose forwards or backwards. Unless they are able to guess which one you chose, they are dealt a basic attack. Gain 1 Combo when you kill a player with Megafist. Gain another +1 Combo if you kill a player with Megafist who visited you the previous night.
- [__HAMMER FALL__]: Requires 3 Combo. Choose two players. Attack them if they visit no one tonight. Gain 1 Combo for each player killed.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- [__POTEMKIN BUSTER__]: Spend [1] Combo. Choose a player and become roleblock immune for the night. If the chosen player visits you tonight, deal an unstoppable attack to them, deal a basic rampage at your own house, and rampage at their house as well. Gain 1 combo for every player killed using this. This informs all players that Potemkin is in-game during the day.
- Overdrive (__HEAVENLY POTEMKIN BUSTER __): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone. Also, all players see this video in daychat, and the victim is pinged.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
